POSITION  Senior Unix Administrator  
REPORTS TO  Senior Manager, Technical Services  
DEPARTMENT  Technical Services  
JOB STATUS  Full-Time  
COMPANY  Rogers Communications Inc.  
DIVISION  Rogers Shared Services  
LOCATION  Ontario  
LOCATION DETAILS  Markham  
JOB TYPE  Information Technology  
JOB REFERENCE #  RILP61  

Responsibilities


The Unix Administrator will be responsible for performance, tuning and capacity of all production Midrange Unix platforms.
They willthino be responsible for assisting and guiding development teams in system application design to ensure a high level of performance, functionality and availability is maintained.
The Unix Administrator will also be required to assist in related software evaluation and upgrades.
Perform system optimization by working with developers, customers and system support personnel.
Investigate and provide methodology, processes and procedures to exploit new features and directions of IMS.
Provide optimization recommendations through historical analysis.
Perform required configuration, maintenance & tuning of all system related components including system software.
Evaluate, provide and maintain software tools to assist internal and external customers.
Aid in problem determination and resolution.
Provide Unix and related system support.
Provide on-call assistance for database related problems.


Qualifications


University degree in computer science or equivalent with substantial, directly related work experience
5+ years HP-UX systems administration and EMC experience are a MUST
Excellent understanding of NFS, DNS and basic routing concepts for problem determination and resolution
Knowledge of NT, Oracle, Sun and AIX systems would be an asset
Strong organizational, interpersonal, motivational & analytical skills
Effective written & verbal communication skills
Availability for on-call support of Unix system related activities
Ability to work effectively on multiple simultaneous tasks within fast paced, “high tech” customer service oriented environments
Ability to complete project tasks in a timely manner
Outstanding customer service skills

Apply for this opportunity using the on-line resume.
Learn of other ways to apply for this opportunity.

Interested Applicants please forward resumes quoting job code RILP61 to rsscareers@rci.rogers.com
